channel.title: Argentinian on Offline Cook Book
channel.description: Recent content in Argentinian on Offline Cook Book

item.title: Dulce de Leche
item.description: Delicious milk toffee used on desserts or as a spread. Substitute for Nootella or similar “food”. It is very demanding, so i only recommend you make it if you either can’t buy industrial dulce de leche (It will be way more natural than other sweets anyway), or have the time and interest to go through the process. It can be made more easily with sweetened condensed milk, but if you have access to it, you can get DDL anyways.

item.title: Torta Frita Criolla (Argentinian frybread)
item.description: A “merienda” (afternoon meal) that is intertwined with the history of colonization on the River Plate region. Never have it by yourself, instead with friends or family, and a cup/gourd of Mate. ‚è≤Ô∏è Prep time: 1h 10min or 2h 10min, (depending on how long you leave it to rest.) üç≥Cook time: 10 minutes. üçΩÔ∏è Servings : 10. Ingredients 1.1 pound (1/2 kilo) of all-purpose flour. 4 tablespoons of lard or butter.
